content: titanium - heidi alander - i designed this shawl at a difficult time in my life while knitting the shawl i realized that after all i was stronger than i could have ever imagined the shawl is named after david guetta s and sia s song titanium yarn the uncommon thread merino sport 100 % merino 100 g / 262 m color nimbostratus about 150 g gauge the gauge doesn t matter much the knitted fabric should be rather loose and drape nicely after blocking the example shawl s gauge is 15 sts and 28 row of garter stitch = 10 cm 4 needles 5-6 mm or to match gauge notions 2 stitch markers size the shawl is about 150 cm wide and the height in the middle is 44 cm © heidi alander 2013 beginning the shawl is started at the neck and knitted downwards stitches are added in the middle and at the edges to give the shawl the triangular shape cast on 3 stitches and knit 7 row of garter stitch rotate the work 90 degrees right and pick up and knit first 3 stitches from the long edge and then 3 stitches from the starting edge 9 sts 1 row ws knit 3 yarn over = yo k 3 yo k 3 2 row knit 3 yo k 2 yo set marker k 1 set marker yo k 2 yo k 3 garter stitch section 1 row ws k 3 yo knit until there are 3 sts left yo k 3 2 row k 3 yo knit to the first marker yo slip marker k 1 slip marker yo knit until there are 3 sts left yo k 3 repeat these two row until there are 231 sts in total next row note remove stitch markers on this row knit 3 purl until there are 3 sts left knit 3 © heidi alander 2013 lace edging knit according to the chart it shows both right and wrong side row also the edge stitches are marked knit the row 1-24 of the chart once repeat the highlighted section 14 times over a row after finishing the chart cast off as follows knit 1 * k 1 slide the left needle through the two stitches on the right needle and knit them together though the back loops* repeat *-* finishing weave in the ends block the shawl with care the shawl can be blocked aggressively so that the lace opens up properly © heidi alander 2013 lace chart © heidi alander 2013
